__e: I thought we could use the time to figure out a way to exploit the company's tech and eventually send you home.
Ours is not to reason why, Charlie, ours is to take advantage of that hard thing and fuck it.
Sometimes when we hit bottom... we ask the wrong people for help-- people who use our weaknesses against us, get us to do things that we never thought we could.
You could've taken advantage of me and you didn't.
People who think they are our friends are just people we can take advantage of when we need them... before leaving them behind.
You're very young and people can take advantage of you.
